casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Philip Ray DAWKINS. No. 83P04-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 13, 2016. Bruce T. Cunningham, Jr., Southern Pines, for Dawkins, Philip Ray. Daniel O'Brien, Assistant Attorney General, for State of N.C. Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, for State of N.C. T. Lynn Clodfelter, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 30th of March 2016 by Defendant to Hold Petition for Writ of Certiorari in Abeyance:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 13th of April 2016."
